node.address: Carrera 6; Numero 67 - 128, Barrio Crespo , Cartagena, Colombia
node.hostelName: Casa Palenque Hostel Beach and Airport

content.value:
The hostel is located only five minutes walking from the airport and next to the nicest and fanciest beaches of Cartagena. Only a short walk to Kite-,Surfing and seaport-schools and the best beach restaurants. You can reach the old town in 20 minutes walking or with a 5 minute bus ride. Closely you will find all stores you need for your convenience like 24-hour supermarkets, drug stores and food. We are close to the Hotel Las Americas.

The hostel consists of four types of dorms (8, 6 and 2x4-beds) and two private rooms ensuite. All rooms come with air-conditioning. In addition, we have several common areas where the guests and travellers can get together and exchange past experiences and future plans.

Set in Cartagena de Indias and with Steps of La Popa Mount reachable within 4.1 km, Casa Palenque Hostel offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
The units at the hostel come with a seating area. All units will provide guests with a microwave.
Guests at Casa Palenque Hostel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.
Cartagena's Walls is 5 km from the accommodation, while Bolivar Park is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 1.3 km from Casa Palenque Hostel.

description.description: Literally only 5 minutes walking to the airport without catching any kind of transportation next to the old town in one of the safest areas in the city, surrounded by beaches, restaurants, kitesurfing-schools, electronic beach parties, supermarkets , bars, beach clubs and only ten minutes from the old town. Our spectacular and convenient location guarantees you enjoyment without any kind of disturbance but with all the happiness and great service you could ask for in a hostel . We provide comfortable dorms and private rooms with air conditioning, outdoor areas with hammocks for chilling or partying, TV-, Lounge- and computer-areas for our guests. A big, well-equipped kitchen, car and motorcycle parking complete our offer and provide you all the facilities you could ask for.
